subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Mark Martin becoming the first 50-year-old driver to win a Nascar Sprint Cup race in 16 years with a victory Saturday night at Phoenix International Raceway.
snippet: Mark Martin becoming the first 50-year-old driver to win a Nascar Sprint Cup race in 16 years with a victory Saturday night at Phoenix International Raceway.
